nodes.text: The BL0-series non-lethal combat droid was a model of combat droid created by Arakyd Industries for non-lethal enforcement. The BL0-series was designed to neutralize its targets rather than killing them, using an array of non-lethal countermeasures including stun whips. The droid scuttled on three legs and had robust hyperarticulated arms. Their effectiveness in combat led many of them to be repurposed as security droids.
